summary: This script copies the text "hello world" to the clipboard, splits it into two parts using echo "spilter", and then retrieves and outputs the first part of the clipped text.

details.comment: This script copies the text "hello world" to the clipboard, splits it into two parts using echo "spilter", and then retrieves and outputs the first part of the clipped text.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
# why this little shit is so goddamn handy in my fucking hand?
# i don't know because it is one of these infinite mistories.
echo hello worls | xclip -i
echo spilter
xclip -o
